Node.definition: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= action by which a man takes a woman as his lawful wife
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
literally: to find favor; hence: = state in which humans find the approval of deities or (other) humans
= state in which humans have a positive and compassionate attitude towards other humans

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
literally: to find (in someone); hence: = process by which humans come upon certain information
= causative action by which humans create a written document, such as a letter, book, or song
= written document; made of papyrus or parchment; either as a single sheet or several sheets sewn together and rolled for storage
= dissolution of a marriage

Node.gloss: to hold, carry, have (in one's luggage)
Node.definition: literally: in (one's) hand; hence: = state of carrying an object physically in one's hand or as part of one's luggage

Node.gloss: to send away|to divorce|to expel|to remove|to cast out
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities force (other) humans to go away from a certain location and/or position; ◄ due to a lack of affection, as punishment, or for other reasons
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range
= state in which humans or deities experience hostility towards a person, an object, or a practice
= pertaining to being the latest in a chronological range of events, which may be situated in either past, present, or future
= causative action by which humans create a written document, such as a letter, book, or song
= written document; made of papyrus or parchment; either as a single sheet or several sheets sewn together and rolled for storage
= dissolution of a marriage

Node.gloss: to hold, carry, have (in one's luggage)
Node.definition: literally: in (one's) hand; hence: = state of carrying an object physically in one's hand or as part of one's luggage

Node.gloss: to send away|to divorce|to expel|to remove|to cast out
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities force (other) humans to go away from a certain location and/or position; ◄ due to a lack of affection, as punishment, or for other reasons
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= pertaining to being the latest in a chronological range of events, which may be situated in either past, present, or future
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible
= person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to send away|to divorce|to expel|to remove|to cast out
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities force (other) humans to go away from a certain location and/or position; ◄ due to a lack of affection, as punishment, or for other reasons
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

= causative action by which humans cause others to become contaminated, ◄ as a result of unlawful activities, ► which often results in their inability to participate in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures
= state in which an event is considered utterly wrong and detestable
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to bring guilt upon|to cause to be declared guilty
Node.definition: = causative action by which a human being brings upon someone else the responsibility for a wrongful act against God or someone else, ► which brings upon that person a state of guilt which may require atonement, restitution, and retribution

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= state in which objects or event have attained a certain state for only a short time

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey
= state in which humans are not held responsible for actions committed in the past or for future commitments
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= causative action where human or deities cause (other) humans to feel and show great joy

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= to seize an object as a pledge for a loan

= set of two stones ► that are used to grind grain into flour; the grain was placed on the stationary bottom stone, and the top stone was pressed down on top of the grain and scraped back and forth; ≈ associated with hardness

= upper stone of two stones ► that are used to grind grain into flour; the grain was placed on the stationary bottom stone, and the top stone was pressed down on top of the grain and scraped back and forth

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= to seize an object as a pledge for a loan
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching

= action by which humans secretly take possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even of other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it
= a human being, as defined by the life principle that animates him/her
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= pattern of actions by which someone treats someone else the way one treats a slave
= causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= human who secretly takes possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: to sweep away|to remove|to banish|to purge
Node.definition: = action by which someone makes sure that a certain event no longer takes place anywhere at all
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong

Node.gloss: to be careful|to make sure|to take precautions
Node.definition: = action by which humans ensure their own well being by being watchful, by making sure that certain instructions are carried out, or by refraining from certain activities
= a disease or sickness or wound ◄ caused by another person or sent from God or a deity ► to punish a person or nation for some wrong or disobedience

= a condition that affects the skin or surface, which probably covers diseases such as psoriasis, favus, leucoderma, but also mildew on cloth and walls; ► a person who suffers from this disease is considered ritually unclean, and therefore unable to participate in worship; clothes and buildings that are affected by it are unclean as well; ≈ regarded as infectious, and seen as a curse and a punishment from God

Node.gloss: to be careful|to make sure|to take precautions
Node.definition: = action by which humans ensure their own well being by being watchful, by making sure that certain instructions are carried out, or by refraining from certain activities

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire knowledge, a skill, or a certain type of behavior

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

Node.gloss: to be careful|to make sure|to take precautions
Node.definition: = action by which humans ensure their own well being by being watchful, by making sure that certain instructions are carried out, or by refraining from certain activities

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= woman; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► elder sister of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן)
literally: road; hence: = action by which humans are travelling from one place to another

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= action with which a person gives money or something of value to another person with the expectation that it will be paid back or returned
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= a reference to any object

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= action by which humans borrow money or goods from other humans with a designated pledge as guarantee; ≈ the need to do this is associated with poverty|= to take an object as a pledge for a loan; ≈ which is regarded as a shameful thing to do, as the person who borrows has the right to designate the pledge himself
= referent to the location outside of an object
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= action with which a person gives money or something of value to another person with the expectation that it will be paid back or returned

Node.gloss: to bring out|to take out|to carry out|to make (someone) leave|to make (someone) depart
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans, animals, or objects to leave a certain place or position

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= referent to the location outside of an object
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security

Node.gloss: to take back|to bring back|to return|to put back|to restore (something)
Node.definition: literally: to turn; hence: = causative action by which animals, humans, deities cause (other) animals, humans, or objects to move back to a location where they have been before

Node.gloss: to take back|to bring back|to return|to put back|to restore (something)
Node.definition: literally: to turn; hence: = causative action by which animals, humans, deities cause (other) animals, humans, or objects to move back to a location where they have been before

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security

= a long, flowing outer garment reaching to the feet; it was generally a loose fitting cloth that was draped around the body and held in place in the middle by a sash wrapped around the waist or some means of fastening such as pins or buttons; it was worn at all levels of society, including also priests and other religious leaders; it served more purposes than just an outer covering; women sometimes carried bowls or other implements or grain in its folds; for poorer people it also served as a covering when sleeping

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= a person who has made himself available to be of service to others for a limited amount of time and in return for payment; who is usually paid daily, and his fragile rights are protected by the law; ≈ often used in metaphors expressing short and limited periods of time
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility
= person who does not have the means to provide for himself/herself, economically or otherwise, and therefore depends on help from other people and God
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option

= state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker classes within the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the widows, the fatherless, and other people who are poor
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= a fixed regular payment for work, either with money or in kind; ≈ by extension: all that happens in return for one's actions
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: to count on|to be intent on|to desire
Node.definition: literally: to put (one's heart or soul) on something or someone; hence: = action by which humans turn to a deity or location with the confidence that they will find help and support there

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which a human being is responsible for a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether committed on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= state in which a human being is responsible for a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether committed on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
literally: to bend (justice); hence: = causative action by which humans alter their way of behavior in such a way that it no longer conforms to established norms and patterns
= a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

= state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker classes within the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the widows, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

= person whose father has passed away and therefore unable to care for himself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the widows, and other people who are poor
= to seize an object as a pledge for a loan
= generic designation for any article of clothing

= woman whose husband has died and therefore has difficulty caring for herself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= bundle of harvested ears of grain

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before

= state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker classes within the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the widows, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

= person whose father has passed away and therefore unable to care for himself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the widows, and other people who are poor

= woman whose husband has died and therefore has difficulty caring for herself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= action by which humans strike another object repeatedly + with a stick or a similar wooden instrument, ► so that items attached to this object will be released

= tree reaching up to 10 m. high, but usually pruned to around 5 m.; its leaves are grayish green above, and whitish underneath; its fruit is about 2 cm. long and a bit more than 1 cm. thick with a hard stone inside and a soft skin that covers the oily flesh; ► its fruit is used for food and oil for cooking, for lamps, for rubbing on the body, for medicine, and for anointing; ≈ regarded as beautiful and associated with well being
= action by which humans check the branches of a tree after having beaten it; ► in order to find any remaining fruit
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y

= state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker classes within the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the widows, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

= person whose father has passed away and therefore unable to care for himself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the widows, and other people who are poor

= woman whose husband has died and therefore has difficulty caring for herself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the fatherless, and other people who are poor
= action by which someone picks or harvests grapes from vines
= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y

= state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker classes within the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the widows, the fatherless, and other people who are poor
